renderedUserMessage.text:
<attachments>
<attachment id="hyprpaper.conf" filePath="/home/phitter/.config/hypr/hyprpaper.conf">
preload = /home/phitter/wallpaper/reze.jpg
#if more than one preload is desired then continue to preload other backgrounds
#preload = /path/to/next_image.png
# .. more preloads
 
#set the default wallpaper(s) seen on initial workspace(s) --depending on the number of monitors used
#wallpaper = monitor1,/path/to/image.png
#if more than one monitor in use, can load a 2nd image
wallpaper = monitor2,/home/phitter/wallpaper/reze.jpg
# .. more monitors
 
#enable splash text rendering over the wallpaper
splash = true
 
#fully disable ipc
# ipc = off
</attachment>
<attachment id="wallpaper.sh" filePath="/home/phitter/.config/hypr/wallpaper.sh">
#!/bin/bash
# Set wallpaper for laptop screen
hyprpaper wallpaper /home/phitter/wallpaper/reze.jpg eDP-1 fill
# Set wallpaper for external monitor
hyprpaper wallpaper /home/phitter/wallpaper/reze.jpg HDMI-A-1 fill
</attachment>

</attachments>
